section.section: The Commissioner shall disapprove a form or withdraw the previous approval of a form filed under § 12-203 of this subtitle if the form does not meet the requirements of subsection (b) of this section.

The order of disapproval or withdrawal of approval shall inform the insurer of:
a statutory or regulatory basis for the disapproval or withdrawal of approval; and
an explanation of the application of the statutory or regulatory basis for the disapproval or withdrawal of approval.
